model-1.name: RoBERTa
model-1.info:
This is a roBERTa-base model trained on ~58M tweets and finetuned for sentiment analysis with the TweetEval benchmark. 
 This model is suitable for English (for a similar multilingual model, see XLM-T). 
 Reference Paper: TweetEval (Findings of EMNLP 2020). 
 Git Repo: Tweeteval official repository. 
 Labels: 0 -> Negative; 1 -> Neutral; 2 -> Positive
